value.stringValue: DCF Waste Water & Bio Chemical Acceptance

assignments.name: Assign_DCF_Values_Link_to_Work_Order
assignments.label: Assign DCF Values - Link to Work Order

assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Assign_DCF_Values_Link_to_Work_Order
assignments.label: Assign DCF Values - Link to Service Resource

decisions.description: if yes, DCF Non Infra record will be linked to work order as well as service resource. If not, it won't link to work order but it will link to service resource only.
decisions.name: Link_to_current_work_order_Yes_No
decisions.label: 'Link to current work order?' Yes/No

rules.name: Checking_reject_delivery_and_text_box_in_empty
rules.label: Checking reject delivery and text box in empty

Flow.description: Created as a part of SFS_3071 Updated as part of SFS-3976 Updated as part of SFS-5333 Updated as part of SFS-6088 Updated as part of SFS-6577 Updated as part of SFS-12/SFL-451
Flow.label: DCF Clean Water Chemical Acceptance and Authorization

fields.name: Header
fields.fieldText: Delivery Checklist - (please tick)

fields.name: Driver_must_gravity_test_before_pressurizing1
fields.fieldText: Driver must gravity test before pressurizing

fields.name: FOR_HYDROCHLORIC_ACID_DELIVERIES
fields.fieldText: FOR HYDROCHLORIC ACID DELIVERIES ONLY: Verbally confirm with delivery driver that he is aware that on completion of delivery the pressure relief valve must be kept closed pressure released into the scrubber system to prevent fuming. If not aware reject delivery.

fields.name: Ensure_driver_and_operator_are_aware_of_any_safeguards_detailed_in_the_LOP1
fields.fieldText: Ensure driver and operator are aware of any safeguards detailed in the LOP for Acceptance and Delivery for the relevant chemical to prevent over pressurisation during discharge. Common control are proving functionality of vents, overflows and ensuring maximum delivery pressures are known and not exceeded.

fields.name: Open_delivery_valve_on_STW_side
fields.fieldText: Open delivery valve on STW side

fields.name: STW_Operator_to_withdraw_outside_exclusion_zone1
fields.fieldText: STW Operator to withdraw outside exclusion zone.

fields.name: Observe_delivery_for_5_minutes1
fields.fieldText: Observe delivery for 5 minutes

fields.name: When_contacted_by_driver_return_to_delivery_area_to_observe_safe_disconnection1
fields.fieldText: When contacted by driver return to delivery area to observe safe disconnection, fit blanking flange, lock delivery point and return valves to correct position. FULL PPE MUST BE WORN WHEN INSIDE EXCLUSION ZONE

fields.name: Full_PPE_must_be_worn_when_inside_exclusion_zone_display_text
fields.fieldText: Full PPE must be worn when inside exclusion zone.

fields.name: Document_storage_display_text
fields.fieldText: Document Storage (Please Tick)

fields.name: All_delivery_paperwork
fields.fieldText: All delivery paperwork (i.e., this document, delivery note and chemical conformity paperwork) must be kept for minimum of 3 years.

fields.name: Confirm_local_archiving_procedures_have_been_followed
fields.fieldText: Confirm local archiving procedures have been followed.

fields.name: Fault_Message_Create
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception while trying to create DCF Non Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Fault_Message_Update
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception while trying to update DCF Non Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: new_file_name
fields.fieldText: new file name

fields.name: IfRejectDeliveryerrormessage
fields.fieldText: Please enter the comments for the Reject delivery

fields.name: Check_tank_for_signs_of_damage_leaks1
fields.fieldText: Check tank for signs of damage leaks

fields.name: Carry_out_a_lamp_test_on_the_panel1
fields.fieldText: Carry out a lamp test on the panel

fields.name: Check_driver_and_STW_operator_have_COSHH_data1
fields.fieldText: Check driver and STW operator have COSHH data

fields.name: Check_Chem_e_safe_containment_bunds_etc1
fields.fieldText: Check Chem-e-safe containment, bunds etc.

fields.name: Check_exclusion_area_and_warning_signs_erected1
fields.fieldText: Check exclusion area and warning signs erected

fields.name: Remove_lock_off_from_delivery_point1
fields.fieldText: Remove lock off from delivery point

fields.name: Visual_check_to_ensure_driver_has_correctly_connected_pipework1
fields.fieldText: Visual check to ensure driver has correctly connected pipework

fields.name: Header2
fields.fieldText: Pre-Delivery Checklist - (Please Tick)

fields.name: Driver_has_site_induction1
fields.fieldText: Driver has site induction

fields.name: Driver_has_RAMS_available1
fields.fieldText: Driver has RAMS available.

fields.name: Confirms_correct_chemical_is_being_delivered1
fields.fieldText: Confirms correct chemical is being delivered

fields.name: Record_Barrel_Number
fields.fieldText: Record Barrel Number

fields.name: Confirm_Barrel_Number_against_listed1
fields.fieldText: Confirm Barrel Number against listed

fields.name: Check_operation_of_wash_hoses
fields.fieldText: Check operation of wash hoses

fields.name: Check_emergency_showers_and_Eyewash1
fields.fieldText: Check emergency showers and Eyewash

fields.name: Check_the_contents_of_emergency_spill_kits1
fields.fieldText: Check the contents of emergency spill kits

fields.name: Confirm_communication_between_driver_STW1
fields.fieldText: Confirm communication between driver & STW

fields.name: Confirm_with_driver_to_contact_STW_prior_to_1
fields.fieldText: Confirm with driver to contact STW prior to disconnection

fields.name: Driver_must_stay_with_delivery1
fields.fieldText: Driver must stay with delivery

fields.name: Understand_how_STW_staff_can_stop_delivery_in_an_emergency1
fields.fieldText: Understand how STW staff can stop delivery in an emergency.

fields.name: Tank_Number
fields.fieldText: Tank Number

fields.name: Sufficient_space_to_accept_delivery1
fields.fieldText: Sufficient space to accept delivery?

fields.name: Check_all_valves_are_in_correct_position1
fields.fieldText: Check all valves are in correct position

fields.name: CleanWaterChemicalAcceptancendAuthorisationToDischargeAssessment
fields.fieldText: Clean Water Chemical Acceptance and Authorisation to Discharge Assessment

fields.name: chemicalAcceptanceFormText
fields.fieldText:
Chemical Acceptance form


If you are unable to accept this chemical delivery at any point in this form please navigate back to this page to reject & give a reason. You will then be able to terminate the form.

fields.name: reject_delivery
fields.fieldText: Reject delivery

fields.name: If_reject_give_comments
fields.fieldText: If reject, give comments

fields.name: remove_reject_reason
fields.fieldText: Please do not add reject reason if you are not rejecting delivery.

fields.name: Rename_paperwork
fields.fieldText: Rename paperwork?

fields.name: Header1
fields.fieldText: Clean Water Chemical Acceptance and Authorisation to Discharge Assessment

fields.name: STW_location
fields.fieldText: STW location

fields.name: link_to_current_work_order1
fields.fieldText: Link to current work order?

fields.name: Chemical_supplier
fields.fieldText: Chemical supplier

fields.name: Chemical_Name
fields.fieldText: Chemical Name

fields.name: Date_time
fields.fieldText: Date & time

fields.name: Qty
fields.fieldText: Quantity

fields.name: Strength_1
fields.fieldText: Strength

fields.name: EnsurePPE1
fields.fieldText: Ensure both driver and STW delivery supervisor are both wearing appropriate PPE as detailed in the SOP/LOP for each specific chemical.

fields.name: Header5
fields.fieldText: Input name below to confirm that delivery procedures have been explained, the above checks have been completed and discharge is authorised to begin.

fields.name: STW_staff
fields.fieldText: STW staff

fields.name: STW_staff_help_text
fields.fieldText: Contact person(s)

fields.name: FSM_Telephone_Number_STW
fields.fieldText: Telephone Number

validationRule.errorMessage: Telephone Number should be 11 digits and contains only numbers

fields.name: Delivery_driver
fields.fieldText: Chemical Delivery driver

fields.name: Delivery_driver_help_text
fields.fieldText: Contact person(s)

fields.name: FSM_Telephone_Number_Driver
fields.fieldText: Telephone Number

validationRule.errorMessage: Telephone Number should be 11 digits and contains only numbers
